fr.groupe40.projet.util.constants

Class Constants

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.groupe40.projet.util.constants.Constants

  • public final class Constants
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains many unclassed constants to manage this project
    Author:
    Jordane Masson, Sarah Portejoie
